publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3064# Alex Johnstone: Belgian Plato Pilot Programme—That the Parliament welcomes the introduction of the Belgian Plato pilot programme for 14 small businesses in Dundee and surrounding areas, providing a business-to-business support structure for small- and medium-sized enterprises and partnering them with parent companies NCR and Michelin to develop a network of support and advice.

S1M-3064# Alex Johnstone: Belgian Plato Pilot Programme—That the Parliament welcomes the introduction of the Belgian Plato pilot programme for 14 small businesses in Dundee and surrounding areas, providing a business-to-business support structure for small- and medium-sized enterprises and partnering them with parent companies NCR and Michelin to develop a network of support and advice.
S1M-3064# Belgian Plato Pilot Programme (lodged on 1 May 2002) Andrew Wilson*
